title: Mexico Average Daily Wages
description: Wages in Mexico decreased to 479.92 MXN/Day in October from 480.65 MXN/Day in September of 2022. Wages in Mexico averaged 270.41 MXN/Day from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 485.38 MXN/Day in July of 2022 and a record low of 129.28 MXN/Day in February of 2000. In Mexico, wages are benchmarked using average daily earnings. This page provides - Mexico Average Daily Wages - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Secretariat of Labor & Soc Welf, Mexico
